creditline: Gift of Richard J. and Helen Lynch Cashman
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: cap with metallic threads overall; metal finial at top with loop; stitched-down pendant dangles--balls, flat teardrop shapes and ring--overall; pair of round medallion pendants with drops with dangles, with red and green round and triangular-shaped glass gemstones; front horizontal band of wide chainmail-like loops
medium: Cotton, metallic threads, metal, glass gems
title: Hat
